column4: can i pay someone ten bucks for a bit of help setting up my router?  i could give it to you via paypal or something.
i've got to get this working and i'm exhausted and need sleep.
i have a di 624, maybe i can help
okay, i have a dsl modem/router and the router is behind that.
i went through the wizard but to no avail.  now i can't even plug into the router and get 192.168.0.1
it seems like my router isn't doing dhcp.
because when i type ifup eth0 when directly connected, it's instant. but with the router it just keeps trying and never gets a DHCP response.
no, you looked like you did
i'm answering you in the query
weird, i can't see any response from you
did you accidentally put me on ignore?
